item.description:
Hi Everyone,

On Friday April 20, the Tragically Hip will be visiting Boston. We will be having a meet-up that night to listen to their music and have a couple drinks in their honor. The show is at Avalon which is located on Lansdowne Street in the Fenway area. All tickets are general admission, and if you are interested in attending please buy a ticket. Tickets go on-sale Friday morning at 10 AM and you can use the ticketmaster link at the bottom to buy your ticket. Please RSVP if you are attending and we will meet-up before the show for some food and drinks, location to be decided later. If you have any questions just let us know.


http://www.ticketmast...

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Music Night - The HIP
